content: charming mushroom ornaments dk yarn red and soft white approximate size 2 5 inches tall 2 25 inches wide 3 5 mm or size 4 circular or double point needles these are knit using magic loop method on a circular needle using long tail cast on and leaving 30 inch tail cast on 6 stitches in white round 1 knit round 2 kfb 12 round 3-10 knit 8 rounds round 11 k2tog k2 9 round 12 knit round 13 k1 k2tog 6 stem complete stuff stem with polyfill not too tightly round 14 kfb 12 round 15 kfb 24 round 16 kfb k3 30 round 17 knit round 18 kfb knit 4 36 round 19 knit 36 mushroom top change to red yarn round 20 knit round 21 purl round 22-24 knit 3 rounds round 25 k2tog k10 33 round 26 knit tie white and red tails at round 20 together to bind clip to 2 inches round 27 k2tog k9 30 round 28 knit round 29 k2tog k2 22 round 30 knit round 31 k2tog 11 round 32 k1 k2tog 6 stuff mushroom cap not too tightly draw thread through remaining 6 stitches pull tight and fasten through top peak make a loop with 6-8 inches of yarn knot at the base of the loop and weave red ends to secure this is your ornament hanger thread long white tail at stem and sew up stem bottom then thread through stem into cap and make 5 or 6 dimples by catching stitch in top of cap and pulling through underside of cap and repeat this will slightly flatten and dimple the rounded cap optional then use remaining white yarn on needle to embroider decorative white french knots on mushroom cap weave in white yarn and trim
